Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Creates standards by which the public service commission reviews and approves a merger or acquisition between telephone corporations, cable corporations and combination telephone and cable corporations
Summary: Creates standards by which the public service commission reviews and approves a merger or acquisition between telephone corporations, cable corporations and combination telephone and cable corporations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to creating standards by which the public service commission reviews and approves a merger or acquisition between telephone corporations, cable corporations, and combination telephone and cable corporations
